Name: Auto Mechanic
About the game: Auto mechanics are the most needed profession. You are in the role of a mechanic, jumping from wheel to wheel, to get to the car. But beware, not every wheel is safe. Auto Mechanic is a pixel arcade game where in each level you need to think with your head before jumping. Find a support in the form of wheels and a sofa. When pushing off, be vigilant, there may be traps. Features of the game: - Many levels - Beautiful Pixel Art - Music
